First of all, this game is great.üëç It really is a very unique and interesting game and I love playing it. But it could have a lot more in terms of content. I'd personally love to see an AI vs AI option, as well as the ability to control where your candidate goes on the map. I'm also not a huge fan of the whole thing with creating custom characters. It's just a bit too restrictive. As well as picking your stance on different issues. In conclusion, I love the game but it could have more content.

Good Game, challenging, just wish AI Only was an option... that would make this go up to 5 Stars. *Edit* Response to Developer: I really really hope yall bring alot of the PC features to mobile, i look forward to it!!! *Second Edit* Its December, why haven't yall updated it with new features? Like AI Only!

content: The game is great, I just wish there was an ai only setting.

I really enjoy the gameplay, however, there are some bugs that make the experience less enjoyable. First, after I created a new canidate, my game crashed and I had to re-install. Secondly, California is bugged on the "Cake" mode. When playing with Kamala Harris, by the tenth turn, her policy ratings dropped to negative 31. Lastly, the loading page is buggy and there are black "stripes" that flicker on the screen. Overall, I love this game (but not enough to give it 5 stars with all of the bugs).
